categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Mack was an alias used by a Human member of the Cularin Militia when he decided to speak out against the Expansion Manifesto, along with his comrades Pac and Grunt. The three soldiers were interviewed by reporter Yara Grugara for Eye on Cularin, however Grugara mocked their opinions. It was revealed that Mack had read the Manifesto only once, and only certain sections.
